website_summaries.verdict: A whole food probiotic that supports digestive health with 15 billion colony-forming units and 13 gut-beneficial probiotic strains, with homeostatic soil organisms (HSOs).
pros: Designed to optimize colon health and provide relief from constipation, while maximizing nutrient absorption
cons: With 1-3 pills a day suggested in a 90-capsule bottle, this could become an expensive probiotic to take regularly

customer_reviews.title: Buy from Sprouts!
customer_reviews.text: I had previously bought these from Sprouts and they were a miracle pill!! My digestion felt amazing which in turn brightened my mood. I decided to order them through amazon because they were 20 Buck cheaper........gave me the runs, thought it might have been a fluke so tried again....runs again. Expiration date was good, might be the transportation or storage that kills the probiotics. Purchased them again from Sprouts and I'm back on track.
customer_reviews.author: Agustin Mercado

customer_reviews.title: From chronic constipation to ‘going’ 3x a day.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always struggled with chronic constipation, bloating, etc. My doctors solution was to give me endless amounts of laxatives which I refused to take. I came across this probiotic and decided to order it. It’s been about two weeks since I’ve started and I’m still only taking 1 a day as opposed to 3. The results have been amazing!!! No more constipation and as a matter of fact, I go about three times a day, MINIMUM
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: Helps control my GERD
customer_reviews.text: A couple of years ago, I developed GERD (severe continuous heartburn). I tried a number of things, including changing my diet, sleeping on a wedge pillow, etc... One of the few things that actually helped was taking Garden of Life Primal Defense Ultra probiotics. They were recommended to me by a fellow GERD sufferer. At first I took one pill twice a day, but as my GERD got better, I cut back to once a day. At this point, I can eat pretty much what I want, and I've stopped sleeping on the wedge pillow. I still get heartburn occasionally, but much less often (usually when I've eaten far too much), and it is MUCH less severe.
customer_reviews.author: Zhi Zhu

customer_reviews.title: I've struggled with eczema and psoriasis for years on my ...
customer_reviews.text: I've struggled with eczema and psoriasis for years on my hands. I've tried everything--prescription cortisone, essential oils, cutting out citrus and diary, wearing gloves all day long. A friend suggested trying this and I thought- what have I got to lose. Just one pill a day and my hands are normal again. I forgot to take the probiotics for a few days and it came back, then went away when I started again. I'm still pinching myself. I have no idea if this would work for others, but thought I'd share.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 1 star because I had too..so I could submit this review. Do NOT buy this product. It is NOT the same product as the Garden Of Life advertises on their website!!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Mercer

customer_reviews.title: Effective mood lifter. Strong probiotic.
customer_reviews.text: Great probiotic. If only people knew how amazing SBOs were. This helps my overall wellbeing and mood. Don't take too many to start, though. I ended up doing so and caused too much die off. Had to take Activated Charcoal to mop up the brainfog and damage. Start slow. Amazing stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many of these and few actually had any beneficial effects. This one is different. I suffer SIBO and have a difficult time keeping my gut flora balanced. At first I was hesitant to use this because it contains Saccharomyces, a yeast. Last thing a SIBO sufferer wants is an abundance of yeast produced gas and bloating. But it didn't happen that way and this product has turned out to be extremely helpful. It has helped my digestion and reduced the fatigue that comes with SIBO episodes. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Bud Esper

customer_reviews.title: Decent but not great
customer_reviews.text: This probiotic isn’t bad, but a bit pricy for only having 5 billion CFU. If you work up to 3 a day, it’s equivalent to 15 billion but taking 3 a day is excessive and I would recommend just 1 probiotic a day that offers at least 50 billion cultures. It gives you the chance of more surviving through your digestive system. Again, this probiotic isn’t terrible, it’s nice to have, but you’re better off getting one with more live cultures per dose!
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Effective and worth it
customer_reviews.text: I work retail. The Christmas holiday season is rough on everyone. I started using probiotics to escape from the flu that plagued my coworkers. Everyone in my store got sick. I was fearful that I would become ill during my trip to India in January. I decided to beef up my probiotic intake and came across this product. It also is a defense against the dreaded Delhi Belly which is typically unavoidable. Happy Dance inserted here! I didn’t get it!!! There was some upper respiratory illness that my traveling companions got and I did not ,despite sleeping in small quarters together!! Winning
customer_reviews.author: Anne D.

customer_reviews.title: Very effective for for regularity
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to straighten out my digestive track. This problem was a side effect from outpatient surgery, et.al. Tried lots of different therapies including probiotics from the grocery store. Nothing I tried had lasting results except "Garden of Life, Primal Defense Ultra". I'm using one capsule daily at night. Within 3 days my system was working normally again. Yay! Only negative, I wish they had a version with less volume of active cultures. For daily use about half would work better for me. At this level some days you will build a bit of gas. Good Luck.
customer_reviews.author: Libby

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: What a great product! Several years ago I had an antibiotic-induced, bacterial gut infection and ran a high fever. I was already on a broad-spectrum probiotic, but it wasn't helping. Then I switched to this product which has S. Boulardii, and almost overnight I began to improve. FYI probiotics can have side effects so stay connected to a health care provider.
customer_reviews.author: snm

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I usually don’t write reviews, but I had to write a review for this product. As soon as I opened the package, I realized there wasn’t a plastic seal around the bottle. Nevertheless, I proceeded to open the bottle. I noticed all the capsules were discolored. Then, I noticed a black residue on my hands. I thought maybe the bottle was dirty, but to my surprise, the black residue was from inside the bottle, all over the capsules. I was disgusted! Imagine I would’ve consumed this product? I’m extremely disappointed and disgusted!
customer_reviews.author: lissette

customer_reviews.title: Cyst/Acne?
customer_reviews.text: I haven't breaken out in quite awhile. After I took this I got a HUGE cystic pimple on top of my nose. I've never had this before is what is strange. I think this product is to blame. I'll stick to just eating yogurt.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Definitely noticed a difference!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking these for a year or two after trying other brands, and I noticed a positive difference right away. I am incredibly regular now, 'nuff said. I recommend digestive enzymes as well to anyone with digestive issues - I went from IBS-D to regular by using them.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: THIS PRODUCT IS NOT GLUTEN FREE-  FALSE ADVERTISING
customer_reviews.text: It took me a while to figure it out, but this product is NOT GLUTEN FREE. I suspected it a little from the start since it contains a barley ingredient, but I believed the label. Anyway, it was the cause of worsening my gluten related medical issues EVERY time I tried to take it. Unfortunately, the window for returning it has closed because it took me a while to figure it out.. When I tried to go to the support website, the link was broken. Do not buy this if you are gluten sensitive. What a huge waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: curlygirl

customer_reviews.title: Have changed my day-to-day life for the better!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these Primal Defense probiotics for the past year, and they've done wonders for me. Previously, I used to cramp up and have pretty severe stomach pains throughout the day from seemingly random foods, and would generally just have an uneasy stomach. After starting taking these, my stomach problems have decreased dramatically--I no longer am concerned about how any food I eat at work will cause me issues, or how long I'll end up feeling uncomfortable. They're not a complete fix, but they have dramatically changed the way I feel throughout the day. I highly recommend you at least try them, if you have similar issues!
customer_reviews.author: hcordray218

customer_reviews.title: ... think Primal Defense Ultra Ultimate Probiotic Formula is a good product. I was diagnosed with Hashimoto's Thyroiditis and ...
customer_reviews.text: I think Primal Defense Ultra Ultimate Probiotic Formula is a good product. I was diagnosed with Hashimoto's Thyroiditis and I had gained alot of weight and my hair was coming out alot. I went on an AIP Diet and lost weight but I lost too much weight. So I began taking Primal Defense Ultra and my hair isn't coming out as much as it did before. And I have started to gain a little bit of weight. I've been taking Primal Defense Ultra almost 3 weeks now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Probiotic EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: Best Probiotic Ever!! Got rid of a fungus under my fingernail within a month!!
customer_reviews.author: Micca

customer_reviews.title: These are very good. They don’t upset my tummy and they keep ...
customer_reviews.text: These are very good. They don’t upset my tummy and they keep me regular. Around Christmas time I was suffering some constipation (too many rich foods I don’t usually eat), these helped when others didn’t. I will absolutely be recommending these to people who need a probiotic.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina J.

customer_reviews.title: Garden Of Life Whole Food Probiotic Supplement
customer_reviews.text: Have been using these capsules for some time. This was my second order. They help keep me regular and help with my acid reflux (which I seldom have now as I've also changed my diet). They are easy to swallow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Traveling!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product based off of a referral from a supplement/nutrition specialist for my recent trip to India. I was very pleased with it, and felt that it was a great addition to my overall regime. After having been to India before, I think this was the thing that made all the difference, and kept my digestive system happy and healthy even while trying all types of new food, and traveling across 13 time zones. Would definitely recommend it for the world traveler!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy L. Maillet

customer_reviews.title: Work great!
customer_reviews.text: Last Spring, my father-in-law was on antibiotics and had surgery for Prostate Cancer and after a few weeks of digestive issues, I asked if he would be open to trying some probiotics. I sent him these and he said within three days his bathroom trips went back to normal. He has been taking one a day ever since and is still thanking me!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron L

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love Garden of Life Primal Defense Probiotic. Best price I've found thus far for the quality. We sold these in the doctors office I work out and stopped. However, this is the first probiotic I'd tried and have had continued success with. I've tried others when I've run out, but they are nothing compared to Primal Defense. Only thing I'd change is switching them to tablet form vs capsule. Took time to train myself how to take them since they like to float. I refer to them as floaters, but, I still Highly recommend them. They are still worth the benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Payne

customer_reviews.title: Recommended to us by someone who has been using for ...
customer_reviews.text: Tried probiotics before and they made out stomach queasy. This works really well. Using for a couple of months before missions trip to Haiti and to help with frequent bouts of digestive issues. Recommended to us by someone who has been using for long time for nervous stomach. she orders thru a dealer. But this was quick delivery and cheaper price.
customer_reviews.author: Bam

customer_reviews.title: My test tells me that this one has no active bacteria. Be careful.
customer_reviews.text: I have done few simple home test (with locally delivered organic milk) and found out that this probiotic do nothing. Milk stay same even after 24 hours. I have been taking this for few months and found out no benefits and decided to check whether I am spending money on right things or not. According to my experiment, this does not contain any live/active bacteria so it is not useful at all. I will try to test other probiotics from Garden of life and see which one has live bacteria. Please check your probiotic before taking it. I have wasted over hundred dollar in this product and now I am upset.
customer_reviews.author: UN

customer_reviews.title: You MUST take 3 a day...not 1
customer_reviews.text: I really like Garden of Life products. Did not expect to write this one star review but I have to. Maybe the bottle I got lost its potency but this batch felt like it was a dud. Been taking probiotics for a long time so I know when something works or not on my system. This batch acted like I was taking anything. I also feel its misleading to say "one capsule daily" on back of box but front implies one capsule equals 10 billion CFU when it doesn't. Probably a great product if you take more capsules per day but GofL should change the dosage. Waste of money and time!
customer_reviews.author: a40sgal

customer_reviews.title: Not for constipation
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this if you suffer from constipation. It will just make it worse. I took this according to the instructions for 4 days. And it resulted in terrible constipation. Perhaps a different formula would work better but I am unlikely to try anything else from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Larry J. Dunlap

customer_reviews.title: Best probiotic on the market, IMHO
customer_reviews.text: Several years ago, after many bouts of antibiotics to get rid of a persistent "sinus infection" (turned out to be a dental issue but that's another review) my gut was a mess. I did some sleuthing online and found Garden of Life. I read the founder's story. I bought a bottle of Primal Defense and my gut has been a happy camper ever since. this is no ordinary probiotic. And it works. Better than anything I've ever used. Better than plain old yogurt. Yes, it's pricey. But it's worth the money. Because -- it works.
customer_reviews.author: Darleen Michael Baker

customer_reviews.title: but this is definitely a good one! The only problem is that it's a ...
customer_reviews.text: This product works amazingly! Honestly, I never thought I could feel the difference between probiotics, but this is definitely a good one! The only problem is that it's a little expensive compared to some others out there.
customer_reviews.author: Ruch

customer_reviews.title: Great daily probiotic
customer_reviews.text: Garden of Life makes high quality probiotics and they test well according to many studies I review when purchasing my probiotics. I am 40 and healthy so I use these as a maintenance supplement. I make my own yogurt and kefir and eat them daily but truly believe that probiotics have helped keep me healthy and regular for the last few years I have used them. I like these because they testerd well ( viable and kept potency) and you don't need to refrigerate so you can travel with them.
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Get this probiotic
customer_reviews.text: I only buy this brand of probiotics and this one was a prime day deal. It’s one of those things that you can’t really see how well it’s working until you stop taking it (I’ve tried and it was a bad idea to stop). This is a great one especially because it doesn’t need to be refrigerated (I forget to take them otherwise). Capsules are kind of big, for those of you who have trouble with pills.

customer_reviews.title: decided to give this kind a go because I do love this brand but it definitely made me constipated
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking a probiotic every day for years, decided to give this kind a go because I do love this brand but it definitely made me constipated, lol

customer_reviews.text: I've been giving this to an 11 year old for more than a year. As long as he takes it regularly he does not have obnoxious smelling gas. The added bonus is that he does not get sick and before that he was often sick with anything going around.

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Tested this among 10+ other brands and products. Found that this works best for me - this plus turmeric and DGL.

customer_reviews.title: It works for me.🙂

I had gotten sick a month ago and I was doing everything I could to get better yet it seemed like it was taking forever just to feel good in my body again, then I remembered I had these probiotics (Garden of life) so, I started taking them one three times a day and within three or four days I felt like myself again. I hope this review helps. 🙂

customer_reviews.title: Look no further! This is a great probiotic!
customer_reviews.text: This probiotic so far has been simple wonderful. Within a couple of weeks I have noticed a huge difference in my gut issues and also the way my skin feels. It seems to help with the dermatitis around my beard and nose, I haven't had any adverse effects so far. It really has boosted my energy I believe from helping me digest my food better, This is a great product I believe I will purchase another bottle once I buy again if these benefits continue going forward. I love the strains included in this product especially S. Boulardi this is a great beneficial bacteria.

customer_reviews.title: They were ok, i just needed a higher dose
customer_reviews.text: Ive been on antibiotics for awhile and now im trying to get my gut healthy again.. I wasnt very impressed with these, whereas with the same brand but the 100 billion cfu I noticed a big difference right away. I might just need a higher dose than this but I do think the brand is trustworthy.

customer_reviews.title: Better before bed
customer_reviews.text: It took me a couple of days for my body to get use to it, and to realize my body does not like certain foods. I find this works better if I take two pills about an hour before bed. Plus it being a dietary supplement these pills tend to suppress my appetite for several hours after waking up. Also I would take the pills every other day for these pills can become quit potent to the body system.
customer_reviews.author: david martinez

customer_reviews.title: And I am glad that I did
customer_reviews.text: After a TON of online research on probiotics I landed on this one on Amazon. And I am glad that I did. This one has all the necessary additives that a probiotic needs to fully perform in your gut and help rebuild or maintain the good bacteria needed to fight off those pesky bad bacteria. A+ product

customer_reviews.text: I have always had terrible gas. These do not alleviate it completely but they do help. When I take them every day I do not catch viruses or colds.

customer_reviews.title: Great to prevent pouchitis
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this probiotic religiously since I had a j-pouch surgery due to UC. 10 years post-surgery and no pouchitis in the last 8 years (since I have been taking this daily). Whenever I start to feel a little off I take two per day, otherwise I take one per day.

This was horrible and made me very sick; I got a headache (which never happens) and was sick to my stomach all day. I only took one and ended up buying my usual probiotics. This was a total waste of money.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I had been hospitalized for a severe bacterial infection..2 months after i still had diarrhea and cramping. A friend recommended Primal defense and it did take about a month to balance everything once again. Getting my energy back, feeling better overall. Will purchase again.

customer_reviews.title: Has been the best probiotic I have tried
customer_reviews.text: Has been the best probiotic I have tried. Helps with digestion of veggies and makes for more regularity. Stop eating wheat and cow's milk and try FODMAP diet. This gets your gut back to being healthy. Worked for the whole family.

customer_reviews.title: Great probiotic
customer_reviews.text: I have been drinking kombucha (by Synergy) for years to help with my digestive issues, and it works, but it's pricey and not always convenient. A friend recommended this brand, and they are great probiotics. I notice the same effects as when I drink kombucha, but actually, the pills seem more potent. I am now up to two capsules a day, and sorry for TMI, but I am going #2 more often, and it helps keep stools solid. I signed up for subscribe and save so I can keep taking this.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: Stable at room temp. Reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: Fair price for a great probiotic. From what I understand it’s a soil based probiotic so the cultures don’t all die off at room temp. Many people buy probiotics off a room temp shelf and put in their room temp cabinet yet they’re cultures that needed to be kept in the fridge. As a result billions of their cultures perish and are technically inert/useless.
customer_reviews.author: MattyGrumps

customer_reviews.title: Good for my gut
customer_reviews.text: I take this practically every day in winter. It helps my immune system stay strong along with my gut issues

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!

After 2 years of getting sick with strep twice and the flu once, I switched my probiotic to Primal Defense this past November and it's now March and I haven't been sick once!! Not even any mild allergy issues! And I live in Austin, TX where allergies run rampant!!! I take it every morning first thing when I wake up.

customer_reviews.text: I tried several probiotics & had negative results so then would quit. I kept getting drawn to articles about them solving constipation & bloating. Someone at WF recommended this probiotic so I tried it. The best I've used. I've been researching fecal transplant & believe that would be the best solution but the FDA is dragging on this. After all it is a natural product so therefore can not be patented by pharmaceutical companies for profit.

customer_reviews.author: Tamara J. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but CAUTION!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a probiotic and purchased this product. I am very satisfied with the product. However, I was looking for a probiotic that I could take once a day, one pill. I read the label included with the product information online, but could not read the fine print. In the fine print, it recommends working up to three pills per day. I was looking for a lower cost product than my previous choice of probiotic; at three per day, this product will not be more cost-effective.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia L. Sakrison

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have in the past had a lot of digestive problems, been taking probiotics for a couple of year and now i seldom have problems. This products works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Herbert E. Miller

customer_reviews.title: I think it works
customer_reviews.text: Just recently had a biceps tendon surgery and one of the recovery suggestions was probiotics to help your body rid itself of the antibiotics. I'm 44, feeling more like 54 at times and decided to give it a try. One month in on physical therapy and the doctor told me I could stop, I'm way ahead of schedule (strength/flexibility) and he didn't understand how. I don't know if this was the reason, but it definitely didn't seem to hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Fine tune your body
customer_reviews.text: Your body is a very fine tune machine; you will want it running at a ultimate rate. It not meant to be chewed like a gummy but with a glass of liquid. I fine it helpful and money well spent .
customer_reviews.author: Chicken Mama

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of faith in the effectiveness of this product. I am prone to UTI's and yeast infections. Since I started taking this product about a year ago I have had no infections and am very regular. I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Girl

customer_reviews.title: This probiotic is working for me!
customer_reviews.text: I take one of these first thing in the a.m. with a glass of water. Within an hour I can feel the difference in my gut. I have several GI problems and these seem to be working to clear/clean up my issues. Will keep on buying them, especially when they are offered from Amazon Prime at almost half price. I trust all Garden of Life Products.

customer_reviews.title: Alright
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed I’ve had probiotics that have helped me more in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: I was regularly taking Florastor as a probiotic as recomended by my physician. I wanted something "More Natural" This product has messed up my system so bad I had to seek advice from my physician She put me back on Florastor and I am better but even after a month and a half not 100% Have to go back to doctor. Extremely upset!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Morris

customer_reviews.title: Best probiotic I have taken
customer_reviews.text: After 5 months of taking Garden of Life Primal Defense Ultra and it is the best probiotic I have ever taken. I had been taking Align for a couple of years. Defense Ultra has worked so much better for me. I have more energy and has helped my IBS. I went without these for a couple of weeks and I could definitely tell the difference. I highly recommend these! I combine these withandfor a great all around supplement combination. These are a very high quality multivitamin. :):)
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Fanastic product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful probiotic, which was recommended to me by a nutrition coach/personal trainer. It produces amazing results in a short period of time. I especially like that they are formulated for use on an empty stomach. I take one in the morning and wait 30 minutes before eating. By the time the 30 minutes is over, I can feel my gut moving and I am ready to digest my breakfast properly. Over the past few months, my health has greatly improved using a combination of strict diet changes and proper supplementation. This probiotic blend is the foundation of my supplement routine. I can't say enough good things about them.
customer_reviews.author: Travel Girl

customer_reviews.title: Is helping me after taking antibiotics. I think I ...
customer_reviews.text: Is helping me after taking antibiotics. I think I will continue to take these for a while to keep my GI tract working properly.
customer_reviews.author: M.S.

customer_reviews.title: Help for re-balancing your gut bacteria
customer_reviews.text: Needed to rebalance my gut due to an auto-immune disease wreaking havoc with my waste removal system. One of these a day for a few days got me back to normal after which I take a pill every few days or as needed (I've added water kefir and fermented veggies to my diet, which has also helped)
customer_reviews.author: JonW

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: Definitely reduces stomach upset. Trusted brand and good quality. I take one or two a day with ginger and my stomach pain noticeably drops.
customer_reviews.author: The Tommasinis

customer_reviews.title: High count reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I have been very satisfied with this shelf stable probiotic that delivers 15 billion cells, which is high when you compare to other capsule based products. I appreciate the fact that the there are a variety of organisms in these capsules. For the amount and diversity of the cells in these capsules the price is very reasonable. I would highly recommend this to anyone looking for an effective, diverse, and reasonably priced probiotic.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Alway works
customer_reviews.text: I have used this a bunch of times and it ALWAYS works. It’s probably the best probiotic on the market. It cleans up any gut issue or imbalance I have ever had. Always worth buying and the price is great here on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: vincentsmommy

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: I feel so much better since using Primal Defense's Probiotic Formula. No more bloating and I'm able to eat a greater variety of foods. Forgetting to take this supplement for a couple of days gives me a quick reminder of why I should get back on it again. My parents have started taking it too with excellent results. The product arrived quickly and packaging was in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie S.

customer_reviews.title: Very satisified with the results
customer_reviews.text: Great seller and fast shipping. And this is a really good product if you need to "stabilize" your gut. I've been taking 2 / day for about 1.5 months, and I've been very happy with the improvements.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Ralston

customer_reviews.title: Did not notice much difference
customer_reviews.text: I really did not notice much of a difference in my health when using as opposed to not using. They sometimes get stuck in your throat when you try to swallow them, but they don't taste horrible or anything. I was just a bit indifferent to the cost vs effectiveness in my overall health.
customer_reviews.author: M Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Made me sick
customer_reviews.text: Made me sick. I don’t know what it is about this particular product but the probiotic portion of it seems to cause me a stomachache every time. I’ve tried different forms of it and each time the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Kelly

customer_reviews.title: They work for those that don’t need a large amount of probiotic strains
customer_reviews.text: These are very good probiotics but it wasn’t as strong as I needed them. I had to buy the 50billion for women.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best PROBIOTIC...hands down!
customer_reviews.text: This is the very best Probiotic Formula! Since using it, my headaches have gone and my days are more predictable. Lots of problems begin in the gut and this product keeps the gut working by adding all the necessary bacteria common to the human intestine. I rely on this product to feel good.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Healed gut after a lifetime of "spastic colon"!
customer_reviews.text: Having been put on heavy duty antibiotics early in life, by my mid twenties I'd developed severe spastic colon. I'd be fine for weeks then I'd suddenly be doubled over with pain & diarrhea. I was never sure what triggered it but over the years found that fatty foods nearly always made me ill. Recently, interested in improving my immune system I tried Primal Defense Ultra after reading the book by its developer. And I've been pleasantly surprised by the improvement in my colon health. For the first time in 60 years, I no longer have food "sensitivities".
customer_reviews.author: DeborahDarlingTop Contributor: Knitting

customer_reviews.title: SO BENEFICIAL!!!! Please give them a try!
customer_reviews.text: Read the story behind how these came to be! Such groundbreaking research that makes such perfect sense. These work wonders and have made such a tremendous difference in our lives! You will feel so much better so order some today and don't wait! Our family suffers from ulcerative colitis and these have helped and can be taken with other medicines.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived damaged and unusable.
customer_reviews.text: Received my normal product which I love. Product arrived damaged and unusable. Shipping package showed no visible damage. Contents/product damaged and unusable. Waiting for replacement with no additional charge.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia M.

customer_reviews.title: nice probiotic for improving gut health
customer_reviews.text: A great blend of beneficial gut bacteria. I have been using this product for a few months now in conjunction with eating more fermented foods and bone broth to improve gut health. Obviously......I started all three at one time so it is hard to give credit only to this product, but since starting this protocol my bloating and other stomach issues have greatly dissipated. I am very pleased so far.
customer_reviews.author: W. Cook

customer_reviews.title: It seemed to ....
customer_reviews.text: It seemed to quiet things down while visiting India. I found them good for travel but don't use them at home.
customer_reviews.author: HI

customer_reviews.title: I am very thankful for them.
customer_reviews.text: After years of neglect my gut is thanking me for these Primal Defense probiotics. After being diagnosed with an autoimmune disorder my integrative medicine doctor suggested these specific probiotics out of the gate as part of my overall health program. They immediately provided relief from irregular bowels and are now an essential part of my recovery. I am very thankful for them.
customer_reviews.author: Rangefinder

customer_reviews.title: Confidence
customer_reviews.text: I take this with confidence in the product and no side effects. Give a small portion to my little dog too.
customer_reviews.author: Jbachflower

product_meta.title: Garden of Life Whole Food Probiotic Supplement - Primal Defense Ultra Ultimate Probiotic Dietary Supplement for Digestive and Gut Health, 90 Vegetarian Capsules
product_meta.description: Size:90 Count (Pack of 1)Primal Defense ULTRA is the ultimate high potency, broad-spectrum probiotic formula. Three capsules per day provide a 15 billion live cell count** of 13 species of beneficial cultures including soil-based probiotics called Homeostatic Soil Organisms (HSOs).
feature_bullets: DIGESTION SUPPORT: Primal Defense 15 billion CFU probiotic supplement contains Lactobaccilus acidophilus, Bifidobacteria, and other strains to maximize the benefits of a healthy diet, boost nutrient absorption, relieve constipation and support digestive health
SOIL BASED PROBIOTICS: The only shelf stable probiotic powder formula containing a unique whole food blend with Homeostatic Soil Organisms (HSO)
IMMUNE SUPPORT: This dietary supplement has 15 billion CFU and 13 hardy beneficial strains for immune system health
COLON HEALTH SUPPORT: These probiotics for constipation promote regular, healthy and comfortable bowel movements
VEGETARIAN PROBIOTIC: Whole food, gluten free, vegetarian probiotics supplement for a balanced, health internal environment

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
